Support and Q&As

This section provides support options and answers to frequently asked questions regarding the use of MuSS.

FAQs

  1. How do I install the required dependencies? - Use the command pip install muspinsim wimda in your command line.

  2. What should I do if I encounter a connection error between MuSS and WimDA? - Ensure that the host and port settings are correct and that there are no firewall or network issues blocking the connection.

Support

For additional support, please contact the MuSS support team via email at [support@muss.com](mailto:support@muss.com).
